errorMessage.title: errorMessage
errorMessage.description: The system message if there was an error or issue or system note. Follow the instructions and provide a response to the user that doesn't contain PII.

purchasableProducts.title: purchasableProducts
purchasableProducts.description: A list of product records that have been verified to be purchasable by the current store. If no productIds or products were input, this will show a generic list of up to 100 purchasable products from the store.

storeId.title: storeId
storeId.description: The storeId of the current store the user is interactive/purchasing from.
